name: eight-queens
description: El famoso puzzle de las 8 reinas, pero deberï¿½s jugar contra un I.A.

scripts.sass-build: node-sass --include-path sass --output-style compressed src/sass/main.sass src/sass/main.no-prefixed.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -o dist/css/main.css src/sass/main.no-prefixed.css && rm src/sass/main.no-prefixed.css
scripts.start-coding: concurrently --kill-others "browser-sync start --server --startPath dist --files dist/index.html dist/css/main.css --no-notify --no-ui" "nodemon -e pug,sass -x \"npm run build-all\"

author: Diego Jara
